title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black! Enjoy your favorite coffee at the touch of a button with this compact and convenient machine. Brew sizes of 6, 8, or 10 ounces in under a minute, perfect for a quick pick-me-up anytime. The 36 oz removable water reservoir makes refilling a breeze, while the smart start feature gets your brew going in no time.

With button controls, energy-efficient auto-off function after 2 hours, and a removable drip tray that accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches, this coffee maker is designed for ease of use. Plus, enjoy the convenience of hot water dispensing for tea or other hot beverages.

Compatible with a variety of K-Cup pods and the option to use a Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, this machine offers versatility to suit your taste preferences. Get your hands on the Keurig K-Compact today and elevate your coffee experience!

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black! This compact coffee maker offers brew sizes of 6, 8, and 10 ounces in under a minute, perfect for your busy mornings. With a 36 oz removable water reservoir and smart start feature, you can enjoy your favorite coffee hassle-free. The button controls and energy-efficient auto-off function make brewing a breeze while saving energy.

Say goodbye to messy spills with the removable drip tray that accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches and holds accidental brews. Need hot water on demand? This coffee maker has got you covered. Compatible with K-Cup pods and not forgetting the environment-friendly option, My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Don't miss out on this versatile and efficient coffee maker that is sure to elevate your coffee experience. Grab your Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today!

With a 36 oz removable water reservoir, smart start feature, and energy-efficient auto-off function after 2 hours, this coffee maker is both convenient and eco-friendly.

The button controls make operation a breeze, while the removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches and can hold a full accidental brew mess. Need hot water? This coffee maker can dispense that too! Compatible with a variety of K-Cup pods, this Keurig also works with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

Don't miss out on the perfect cup of coffee every morning with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Get yours today and elevate your coffee experience!
